item.description:
Adult indoor Roller Skate / Roller Blading

Sunday Oct. 7 th.. 8 pm.
Chez-Vous
11 Rhoades st.
Dorchester Ma. 02124

Cost: $10.
Skate rental are available.
Carpooling from AND along the way.Â  Starting in Nashua NH., at 7 pm. through Chelmsford, Burlington and Medford MA..
Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of exercising, socializing and music. This is an indoor adult setting, no kids. This is a great place to learn, or improve your skating skills. Steve is an instructor, and if asked, he will be happy to offer you some free help to get you started. Come and see skating in an all new way. The skaters at this rink are some of the best free dancer skaters in N.E.. Steve carpools from Nashua at 7 pm. on down. The doors of the rink open at 8 to midnight. This is Steve Ob1.'s work out. So he will not make it much past 10:30. That usually puts us back in Nashua, NH around 11:30 pm

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading Boston
